response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would significantly enhance your business operations. Considering its worth to us, we are offering you the chance to purchase this product at a special introductory price of $800,000. This is a unique chance to secure a valuable asset at a significant discount. We hope to hear your positive response soon. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 800000}
